title: Ring Buoy
description:
A round white and orange or red ring buoy with string laced through its perimeter. Also called a life preserver.

Maybe be used to talk about water, boats, and safety. May also be used metaphorically to talk about someone or something that saves.
apple_vendor_description: The ring buoy emoji on Apple devices presents a vibrant, circular flotation device, typically rendered in a bright, cheerful red or orange with crisp white accents. Appleâ€™s design imbues it with a subtle, glossy sheen and soft, rounded edges, giving it a tangible, almost buoyant feel. This emoji commonly symbolizes safety, rescue, vacation, or a need for help, adding a visual cue for situations requiring support or a change of fortune in messages.
